snippet: It will be a fourth straight day on court for Novak Djokovic when he faces Dominic Thiem in the French Open semifinals Friday....
lead_paragraph: It will be a fourth straight day on court for Novak Djokovic when he faces Dominic Thiem in the French Open semifinals Friday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic's French Open Semifinal Is 4th Day in Row on Court
headline.main: Djokovic's French Open Semifinal Is 4th Day in Row on Court
